Game installs fine, crack works fine

However, either the game, or skidrows extraction is weird or my PC being r-tarted, I am facing some major problems during the game.

* Game randomly crashes, and i mean randomly
at some points

* Probably because of the above problem, my PC settings do not save i.e. graphics settings. This is quite annoying as you have to reset the settings again and again every time you start up the game.

* I tried saving all the settings, including my game save file, and then manually exiting the game. However, the PC settings AGAIN resets itself to a previous setting. *sigh*

This could all be the problem of my PC, however, I want to see if anyone else is encountering similar problems on this skidrows version. If so, i might go get the TPTB version of this game.

Note: I doubt it, but could the difficulty of the game cause problem? I have both the game/QTE settings on "impossible" mode
